content:
Sure, here are ten example headlines for performance max campaigns that use the keyword "cute mushroom gifts" and are under 90 characters:

1. "Gift the fun-gi way: Cute mushroom gifts"
2. "Score some brownie points with our cute mushroom gifts"
3. "Mushroom-themed gifts for the adorable mushroom lover"
4. "Adorable mushroom gifts for any occasion"
5. "Shopping for a mycophile? Check out our cute gifts"
6. "Cute and quirky mushroom gifts"
7. "Gift something unique: Cute mushroom-themed items"
8. "Fall in love with our cute mushroom gift collection"
9. "Mushrooms never looked so cute - Shop now"
10. "Brighten up someone's day with cute mushroom gifts"

Keep in mind that the headlines should align with your ad targeting, landing page and overall message, to create a cohesive message throughout the customer journey. Additionally, testing different headlines can help you to determine which one performs better and resonates with your target audience.
